Posts.Content: jacqdan wrote: hi I was just told I have breast cancer yesterday afternoon. it didn't fully hit me until today. Ihave a 3 cm tumor and dont know what to expect. i am on an hmo and my doctor just gave me refferals which I cannot do anything about until monday.  She could not give me any details of how far it has spread or anything else My family is gone for the next 4 days on vacation.  And I dont want to tell them till they get back. Im sorry to ramble on im just scared. thanks for listening. I just feel so alone right now. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: im scared jacqdan sueper13
